Senator -Eugene J. McCarthy
March 8, 1967
For these reasons, ten of the Minnesota private colleges have asked
the F.C.C. to reserve FM channels for the establishment of a Minnesota
educational radio network.
This proposed network can only be established and supported with the
aid of the Public Television Act of 1967. Our broadcasting efforts at
St. John's could increase substantially in effect and quality with the
support outlined in this legislation.
I hope that you will agree with us, in evaluating the merit of this
bill when it is introduced and give it your full support.
Sincerely,
Colman J. Barry, O.S.B.
